name: One Night With Snatch
description:
0.9!

• Hi this is a fnaf game lol 

• Snatch and his tail act separately. They can overlap. Snatch can kill you in two ways: Hitting a door twice, being in the middle of breaking a door when you peek your tiny head out the doorway. His tail kills you by politely knocking first, then barging in if you don't answer. 

• Snatch is reset every time he attacks a door, or you flash him. 

• The tail is reset when you look at it for a while 

• Reach 15 fuel to win. They get harder later on. Spare your flashes 

• I still have a ton of functionality to add, polish to do, sounds to rehash. I'm very happy with what's out here though!
